name: Magdalena Bicz
body:
### About

* Tech savvy, process oriented and creative thought-leader with many years of experience
* Creating worker-friendly and effective office environments
* Bridging effectively Office Administration, Accounting and Finance
* Comfortable in fast-growth startup environment, bringing fresh ideas to any established Enterprise
* Hands-on building and cultivating operational excellence and culture from the ground up
* Supporting the business growth, managing talent base and HR processes, utilizing employment law literacy
* Operating in multinational, multicultural and distributed  teams in fast-paced and Agile environment


### Contact
* magdalena+jobs@bicz.net
